about_the_game:
WARNING

Sick Beats Ahead

The soundtrack for Sea of Choices is full of electric keyboard and bass licks.
There's also tons of percussive grooves accompanied by pretty melodies.
A string arrangement pops up every once in a while.
Oh and it's got some absolutely sick electric keyboard and bass licks. Wait, I said that already huh.
Well there's plenty to enjoy.

Have fun and thanks for the support!
